localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Meetings won't feel like they go on forever anymore. Zoom Agenda lets you create an agenda and add a timer to every agenda item so you know how long to spend discussing about each item.
blogPost.body: Meetings won't feel like they go on forever anymore. Zoom Agenda lets you create an agenda and add a timer to every agenda item so you know how long to spend discussing about each item.
blogPost.title: Zoom Agenda Timer - Create a timer for your agenda items on Zoom.
blogPost.author: Danielle Song

localize.description: 会议不会再有永远进行下去的感觉。Zoom Agenda可以让您创建一个议程，并为每个议程项目添加一个计时器，这样您就可以知道每个项目的讨论时间。
localize.tagline: 在Zoom上为您的议程项目创建一个定时器。

localize.description: 會議不會再有永遠進行下去的感覺。Zoom Agenda可以讓您創建一個議程，併爲每個議程項目添加一個計時器，這樣您就可以知道每個項目的討論時間。
localize.tagline: 在Zoom上爲您的議程項目創建一個定時器。

previous.excerpt: CyberCat VPN is Your Unlimited, Encrypted, Fast & Ad Free VPN for iPhone & iPad. Welcome to a new world of internets with a super fast and secure no log VPN. Bring down the virtual walls and pounce on all the content you can handle.
previous.title: CyberCat VPN - A privacy focused, Ad blocking, Unlimited VPN for iOS. Meow

localize.description: CyberCat VPN是您的iPhone和iPad的无限制，加密，快速和无广告的VPN。欢迎来到一个全新的网络世界，拥有一个超级快速和安全的无日志VPN。拆除虚拟墙，扑向所有你能处理的内容。
localize.tagline: 一款专注于隐私、广告屏蔽、无限VPN的iOS版。喵

localize.description: CyberCat VPN是您的iPhone和iPad的無限制，加密，快速和無廣告的VPN。歡迎來到一個全新的網絡世界，擁有一個超級快速和安全的無日誌VPN。拆除虛擬牆，撲向所有你能處理的內容。
localize.tagline: 一款專注於隱私、廣告屏蔽、無限VPN的iOS版。喵

next.excerpt: Translate words straight from your Alfred launcher: - Open Alfred - Type a language combination and a word: `fren fromage` - Press enter to open the results page on WordReference! Get access to 48 dictionaries across 18 different languages!
next.title: WordReference for Alfred - Multilingual translations at your fingertips!

localize.description: 直接从您的Alfred启动器翻译单词： - 打开Alfred - 输入语言组合和单词：`fren fromage` - 按回车键打开WordReference上的结果页面! 获得跨越18种不同语言的48种词典的访问权限!
直接從您的Alfred啓動器翻譯單詞： - 打開Alfred - 輸入語言組合和單詞：`fren fromage` - 按回車鍵打開WordReference上的結果頁面! 獲得跨越18種不同語言的48種詞典的訪問權限!
